comprehensive_overview: Fujitsu is a multinational information technology equipment and services company headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Fujitsu offers a wide range of products and services including servers, storage systems, software, networking equipment, and more.
core_features: Fujitsu provides innovative solutions in the areas of cloud computing, big data analytics, artificial intelligence, IoT, and cybersecurity. Their products and services cater to various industries including finance, healthcare, retail, and manufacturing.
